description: Eating a clean diet and being able to digest, absorb and utilize the nutrients from the food you eat are two DIFFERENT things. How do you know if you can't?...
cleaned_text: Eating a clean diet and being able to digest, absorb and utilize the nutrients from the food you eat are two DIFFERENT things. How do you know if you can't? Your body will let you know with symptoms - to heartburn, reflux, bloating, gas, nausea, constipation, diarrhea, Crohn's, Colitis, IBS or Diverticulitis. Join Dr. Keith at my upcoming talk on digestion at the [Naperville Area Chamber of Commerce](https://www.linkedin.com/company/naperville-area-chamber-of-commerce?trk=public_post-text). Click on the link to register now. You don't want to miss this. Learn how to stop suffering and what you can do to regain your health.
